definition: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine

translations.bg: Йерушалаим или Йерушалем, столица на Палестина
translations.cs: Jerušalajm nebo Jerušalem, hlavní město Palestiny
translations.da: Jerushalaim eller Jerushalem, hovedstaden i Palæstina
translations.de: Jeruschalaim oder Jeruschalem, die Hauptstadt von Palästina
translations.el: Jerushalaim ή Jerushalem, η πρωτεύουσα της Παλαιστίνης
translations.es: Jerushalaim o Jerushalem, capital de Palestina
translations.fr: Jerushalaim ou Jerushalem, capitale de la Palestine
translations.id: Yerushalaim atau Yerushalem, ibu kota Palestina
translations.it: Jerushalaim o Jerushalem, capitale della Palestina
translations.ja: ジェルシャライムまたはジェルシャレム、パレスチナの首都
translations.nb: Jerushalaim eller Jerushalem, hovedstaden i Palestina
translations.nl: Jerushalaim of Jerushalem, de hoofdstad van Palestina
translations.pt: Jerushalaim ou Jerushalem, a capital da Palestina
translations.sk: Jerušalaim alebo Jerušalem, hlavné mesto Palestíny
translations.sl: Jerushalaim ali Jerushalem, glavno mesto Palestine
translations.sv: Jerushalaim eller Jerushalem, huvudstad i Palestina
